channel.title: Need an opinion
channel.description: I need some help what would be a good source and client for my first server? can someone please reply?

item.title: Need an opinion
item.dc:creator: @Neon_Fortune Neon Fortune
item.description:
@Neon_Fortune wrote:

Saphire`:

How wouldn’t they know where to start? Java is based around objects so as long as they have java knowledge then they would be able to make their own base, I’m wasting my time trying to explain to you, idiot.

Guess I’m an idiot for not knowing something?

The definition of an idiot is someone with below normal intelligence. So I guess everyone who doesn’t know Java is an idiot? Right?

Read full topic

item.description:
@aug551 wrote:

For a new dude i’d say hollowfied dreams or imma post my server soon that’s a good one for a new coder

item.title: Need an opinion
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

Look in the Server Downloads Section? Click on a Thread and read through it. If you like it then hit the big DOWNLOAD button. It’s what I did for my first server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need an opinion
item.dc:creator: @Neon_Fortune Neon Fortune
item.description:
@Neon_Fortune wrote:

[quote=“Saphire`, post:4, topic:381902”][quote author=Neon Fortune link=topic=477713.msg3495556#msg3495556 date=1297293684]
If you know a java Hyperion with a 317 client would be the best.

But if you don’t maybe DeltaScape.
[/quote]

You really think he would ask what server to use if he knew ‘Java’? Knowing Java would probably give him the insentive to make his own base.[/quote]

Actually yeah, I kind of do think that. Someone could know all about java and only play RuneScape. Then decided they wanted to make RSPS but weren’t sure where to start.

So yeah, I do think that.

Read full topic
